Subject: Where I should add rules to? / Don't fetch if fetched in last N days.
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=370021973

Hello,

I am trying version 1.14.3.
Thank you for Gordon and development team!!


And, I have two question.

1. I want to select fetch or not, per hosts.
I create overrides per hosts.
Where is I should add rules?

DecidingScope#decide-rules
or
Preselector#decide-rules
LinksScoper#decide-rules
scope-rejected-url-rules
Scheduler#decide-rules
or other??

I want to filter by url. Than I think
MatchesRegExpDecideRule/NotMatchesRegExpDecideRule is good for me.
For example, I want to get http://xxxx.com/news/.+.html, but not want
to fetch http://xxxx.com/ad/.*, and we have many rules.


2. Don't fetch if the url is fetched in last 7 days.
I trying with FetchHistoryProcessor/PersistStoreProcessor/PersistLoadProcessor.
http://webteam.archive.org/confluence/display/Heritrix/Release+Notes+-+1.14.3
http://webteam.archive.org/confluence/display/Heritrix/Feature+Notes+-+1.12.0

When recrawling, I don't send any HTTP request if the URL is fetched
in last 7 days.
Can I do this ?
I think the History has fetched timestamp, then it can do this, I think.

Very sorry to my poor english, every time.

takeru
